title: Topic 001 Question 759
body: A company is planning to migrate to the AWS Cloud. The company is conducting organizational transformation and wants to become more responsive to customer inquiries and feedback.
Which tasks should the company perform to meet these requirements, according to the AWS Cloud Adoption Framework (AWS CAF)? (Choose two.)
options: Realign teams to focus on products and value streams.
Create new value propositions with new products and services.
Use agile methods to rapidly iterate and evolve.
Use a new data and analytics platform to create actionable insights.
